divs: Sighting DetailsI was just leaving my girlfriends house in a suburban neighborhood in my hometown. I was getting onto my motorcycle getting ready to start it. I looked upfrom the instrument panel momentarily and saw it. i was at the top of a hill soit was at eye level. I was not sure what it was. I just stared at it as it sovery silently hovered there. then it tilted forward about 90 degrees and then iheard an almost mechanical sound as it tilted and also a light or beam of somesort was focused on a fixed spot on the ground. after tilting it became silentonce more and hovered with its lightbeam still shining. then it tilted back 90degrees to its origional position once again making a similar but not the samesound as before and the light was turned off. it hovered there for about 15 moreseconds. then suddenly I saw the fastest moving object i have ever seen in mylife shoot directly upwards with instantanious velocity. during this there was asound of rushing of wind that kind of whistled like a firework. Well the wholetime there was a woman next door working in her yard who had obviously seen theobject too, we where approxomatley 8 feet from each other. we looked at eachother with that blank shocked look on our faces. then she said, It was probablya helicopter. I replied, Yeah probably a helicopter, I then started mymotorcycle and went home.
